title: Blogify
description: A blog platform where users can sign up, post articles, and comment on them. Built using Ruby on Rails.

title: LightWeight Fine-Tuning
description: Implementation of parameter-efficient fine-tuning using Hugging Face PEFT, reducing computational costs while improving model performance for text generation tasks.

title: Dog Breed Identifier
description: A Python application that classifies dog breeds using image recognition techniques.

title: Note App
description: A simple note-taking application built with React and Node.js.

title: Chatbot
description: A dynamic university chat application enabling real-time messaging, media sharing, and group chat features.

title: Grocery Management System
description: A platform that manages inventory, purchasing, and consumption tracking to ensure users have the right items in the right quantities.

title: Myriad
description: A comprehensive project management tool designed to streamline workflows and enhance team collaboration.

title: Gym Management System
description: An application to manage gym memberships, track attendance, and handle billing processes efficiently.
